summary: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly down on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining stock report: Thursday, November 17
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly down after the close of trading Thursday.
The price of bitcoin was about $16,695 at the time of market close, according to TradingView.
BTCUSD Chart via TradingView
The stocks down the most were Bit Mining Ltd. (17.9%), Iris Energy Ltd. (11.82%) and Argo Blockchain US (10.52%).
